original_title: Litro to reduce LP gas prices again in July
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas announced that the prices of domestic LP Gas cylinders will be reduced with effect from July, once again.
Litro Chairman Muditha Peiris told News 1st that the price revision will take place as per the price formula.
The previous Litro Gas price revision took place on the 4th of June.
F1 team Alpine secure €200m backing from investors including Hollywood actor Ryan Reynolds
